comments.name: remarks
comments.value:
Runs a particular command asynchronously from the context of this entity.
Note that there is a maximum queue of 128 asynchronous commands that can be run in a given tick.

comments.name: param
comments.value: The command to run. Note that command strings should not start with slash.

comments.name: returns
comments.value: For commands that return data, returns a JSON structure with command response values.
